name: BOOM BAT 2
description:
"Get ready to draw your gun and defend your territory in this thrilling shooter! Hordes of vicious bats are threatening your safety. You must take position and fire on these flying creatures before they attack you. This game will immerse you in intense and addictive action. Are you ready to take the challenge and eliminate all the bats? Play now and find out for yourself!"

---------------------------------------------CONTROL------------------------------------------------

Arrow keys and space

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is available in mobile
